name: Out of the Shadows (Brainiac Games)
description:
Out of the Shadows is a cave based action platformer game.

In Out of the Shadows, you must escape a cave, avoiding obstacles in 8 progressively harder levels. Some obstacles include bats, stalactites, stalagmites and water. You have one light, a headlamp. It has three batteries and every time you take damage, a battery is destroyed and your light source reduces in light intensity. 


I sincerely apologise for no web build. I have tried to find a solution but every time it would simply show a black screen. Hopefully some day there will be a web version.

There is a game save feature. You can pause the game and click save to save your progress. When you next load in to the first level, at the top there will be an option to load from local save.
